mapper.insert: insert into t_common_chat (f_content, f_release, f_uid, f_oid, f_state, f_url, f_type, f_long) values (#{fContent}, #{fRelease}, #{fUid}, #{fOid}, #{fState}, #{fUrl}, #{fType}, #{fLong});
mapper.select: select * from t_common_chat where (f_uid=#{fUid} and f_oid=#{fOid});
mapper.update: UPDATE t_common_chat SET f_state=#{state} WHERE f_uid=#{oid} AND f_oid=#{uid};
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_common_chat WHERE f_uid=#{oid} AND f_oid=#{uid} AND f_state=0;
